notes: Datasets indicate the Water supply and WSP performance indicators in Kenya as ascertained by majidata organization (www.majidata.go.ke). MajiData is the pro-poor database covering all the urban low income areas of Kenya which has been prepared by the Ministry of Water and Irrigation (MWI) and the Water Services Trust Fund (WSTF) in cooperation with UN-Habitat, the German Development Bank (KfW), Google org. and GIZ.
